item.title: CVE-2022-2261|2024-08-03T00:32:09.674Z -- unknown -- wpide%20%E2%80%93%20file%20manager%20%26%20code%20editor
item.description: The WPIDE WordPress plugin before 3.0 does not sanitize and validate the filename parameter before using it in a require statement in the admin dashboard, leading to a Local File Inclusion issue.
